thread.title: Some funds with a conscience dump Facebook

title: Some funds with a conscience dump Facebook
text:
Some funds with a conscience dump Facebook 01:58
Facebook has been raked over by lawmakers on both sides of the Atlantic for its massive data breach scandal, and now some investment funds – citing social responsibility - are dropping the social media giant’s shares. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Facebook has been raked over by lawmakers on both sides of the Atlantic for its massive data breach scandal, and now some investment funds – citing social responsibility - are dropping the social media giant’s shares.
